description: archetictural drawing; lower section:pillars on sides, peak at top; center top has ball with small face above and garlands from ball to sides; top section: center four sided with arched top and bottom sides; pillars at sides different from thoes below; oval cartouche at center top with a puti on either side; numbered scale along left side of drawing
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on plate below image in black: [ Amstelodami  C. Dankerts excudebat]; on sheet in pencil:[1-339]
title: Print
